name: mndomgmid

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cexid))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ ExId))
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ ExId)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cmagm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cexid))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ ExId))
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ Magma)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ ExId)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cin(cmagm, cexid)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cmndo), wcel(c0, cexid))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈(Magma ⋂ ExId))
⊣ (c0 ∈ MndOp → c0 ∈ ExId)

comment: A monoid is a magma with an identity element. (Contributed by FL, 18-Feb-2010.) (New usage is discouraged.)
